description: Extracts SNC credit risk relevant information from press release text, focusing on financial performance, strategic changes, and potential risk factors.

parameters.name: press_release_text
parameters.description: The full text of the company press release.

parameters.name: company_name
parameters.description: Name of the company for context.

parameters.name: key_areas_of_concern_csv
parameters.description: CSV string of general areas to look for, e.g., 'financial results,debt,management changes,layoffs,regulatory issues,product failures,M&A,strategic partnerships,market outlook'
parameters.defaultValue: financial results,debt,management changes,layoffs,regulatory issues,product failures,M&A,strategic partnerships,market outlook
